claw.tatsu.xcodeml.xnode.common

Class Xnode

  • java.lang.Object
    • claw.tatsu.xcodeml.xnode.common.Xnode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssignStatement, FbasicType, FfunctionDefinition, FfunctionType, FmoduleDefinition, FstructType, XcodeML, XdeclTable, XglobalDeclTable, Xid, XsymbolTable, XtypeTable

    public class Xnode
extends java.lang.Object
    XcodeML AST node.
    Author:
    clementval

        public void append(Xnode node,
                   boolean clone)
        Append an element ot the children of this element.
        Parameters:
        node - The element to append.
        clone - If true, the element is cloned before being appended. If false, the element is directly appended.

      • append

        public void append(Xnode node)
        Append an element ot the children of this element. Node is not cloned.
        Parameters:
        node - The element to append.

      • lineNo

        public int lineNo()
        Get the lineno attribute value. This attribute is not defined for every elements.
        Returns:
        Line number. 0 if the attribute is not defined.

      • filename

        public java.lang.String filename()
        Get the file attribute value. This value represents the original filename from the XcodeML unit. This attribute is not defined for every elements.
        Returns:
        File path. Empty string if the file attribute is not defined.

      • isDirectSibling

        public boolean isDirectSibling(Xnode end,
                               java.util.List<Xcode> skippedNodes)
        Check whether the end node is a direct sibling of this node. If other nodes are between the two nodes and their opcode is not listed in the skippedNodes list, the nodes are not direct siblings.
        Parameters:
        end - Node to be check to be a direct sibling.
        skippedNodes - List of opcode that are allowed between the two nodes.
        Returns:
        True if the nodes are direct siblings.

      • matchAncestor

        public Xnode matchAncestor(Xcode opcode)
        Find node with the given opcode in the ancestors of the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the node to be matched.
        Returns:
        The matched node. Null if nothing matched.

      • matchSibling

        public Xnode matchSibling(Xcode opcode)
        Find node with the given opcode in the siblings of the given node.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the node to be matched.
        Returns:
        The matched node. Null if no node found.

      • matchAllAncestor

        public java.util.List<Xnode> matchAllAncestor(Xcode opcode)
        Find nodes with the given opcode in the ancestors of the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the node to be matched.
        Returns:
        List of matched node. Empty list if nothing matched.

      • matchAllAncestor

        public java.util.List<Xnode> matchAllAncestor(Xcode opcode,
                                              Xcode stopCode)
        Find nodes with the given opcode in the ancestors of the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the node to be matched.
        stopCode - Stop searching if given opcode is reached. If null, search until root node.
        Returns:
        List of matched node. Empty list if nothing matched.

      • matchDescendant

        public Xnode matchDescendant(Xcode opcode)
        Find node with the given opcode in the descendants of the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the node to be matched.
        Returns:
        The matched node. Null if nothing matched.

      • matchDirectDescendant

        public Xnode matchDirectDescendant(Xcode opcode)
        Find node with the given opcode in the direct descendants the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the node to be matched.
        Returns:
        The matched node. Null if nothing matched.

      • matchDirectDescendant

        public Xnode matchDirectDescendant(java.util.List<Xcode> opcodes)
        Find node with one of the given opcodes in the direct descendants the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcodes - List of opcodes to be searched.
        Returns:
        The matched node. Null if no node found.

      • matchSeq

        public Xnode matchSeq(Xcode... opcodes)
        Find node with the given path of opcodes from the current node.
        Parameters:
        opcodes - Sequence of opcode to reach the node.
        Returns:
        The matched node. Null if no node found.

        Match all nodes with the given opcode in the subtree.
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode of the nodes to be matched.
        Returns:
        List of all nodes matched in the subtree.

        public int depth()
        Get the depth of the node in the AST.
        Returns:
        A depth value greater or equal to 0.

        Parameters:

        Compare the inner value of the first child of two nodes.
        Parameters:
        other - Node to compare with
        Returns:
        True if the value if first childs are identical. False otherwise.

      • compareOptionalValues

        public boolean compareOptionalValues(Xnode other)
        Compare the inner values of two optional nodes.
        Parameters:
        other - Node to compare with
        Returns:
        True if the values are identical or elements are null. False otherwise.

        Compare the inner values of two nodes.
        Parameters:
        other - Node to compare with
        Returns:
        True if the values are identical. False otherwise.

        Insert a node just before this node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node to be inserted before the current one.

      • findParentModule

        Find module definition node in which the current node is nested if any.
        Returns:
        A FmoduleDefinition node if found. Null otherwise.

      • isNestedIn

        public boolean isNestedIn(Xnode ancestor)
        Check whether a node is nested into another one.
        Parameters:
        ancestor - Node in which the current node is supposed to be nested.
        Returns:
        True if the current node is nested in the ancestor node. False otherwise.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Return type hash associated with this node if any.
        Returns:
        Type hash. Empty string if there is no type hash associated.

        public void setType(java.lang.String value)
        Set the type of the current node.
        Parameters:
        value - Type value.

      • constructRepresentation

        public java.lang.String constructRepresentation(boolean withNamedValue)
        Construct string representation of the node. Only for variable or constant.
        Parameters:
        withNamedValue - If true, keeps the named value, otherwise, just constructs the argument.
        Returns:
        String representation. Null if node is null.

      • copyEnhancedInfo

        public void copyEnhancedInfo(Xnode target)
        Copy the enhanced information from the current node to a target node. Enhanced information include line number and original file name.
        Parameters:
        target - Target node to copy information to.

      • hasSameParentBlock

        public boolean hasSameParentBlock(Xnode n)
        Check if the given node is direct children of the same parent node.
        Parameters:
        n - Node to be compared to.
        Returns:
        True if the given node is direct children of the same parent. False otherwise.

      • findParentFunction

        public FfunctionDefinition findParentFunction()
        Find function definition in the ancestor of the current node.
        Returns:
        The function definition found. Null if nothing found.

                          Xattr attr)
        Copy the attribute from the current node to the given node.
        Parameters:
        to - Xnode to copy to.
        attr - Attribute code to be copied.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a brief description of the Xnode.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
